verses.translation: We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:
And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
verses.transliteration: Laylatu alqadri khayrun min alfi shahr

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: Therein come down the angels and the Spirit by Allah's permission, on every errand:
verses.transliteration: Tanazzalu almala-ikatu warroohufeeha bi-ithni rabbihim min kulli amr

verses.translation: Peace!... This until the rise of morn!
